title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - AI-Powered Urban Design System
description: Gather, document, and prioritize requirements for the AI-powered urban design system. These include stakeholder needs, design constraints, data sources, performance expectations, regulatory compliance, and potential use cases. Ensure that technical and non-technical aspects are addressed, and provide a clear roadmap for development.

title: Architect the System
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including the AI model, data pipelines, user interfaces, and integration with existing urban planning tools.

title: Develop AI Model
description: Implement the AI model for optimizing urban planning, including data preprocessing, model training, and inference.

title: Build Data Pipelines
description: Develop data pipelines for ingesting and processing urban planning data from various sources, such as GIS databases, satellite imagery, and demographic data.

title: Design User Interfaces
description: Create user interfaces for urban planners and stakeholders to interact with the AI system, visualize results, and provide input.

title: Implement System Integration
description: Integrate the AI system with existing urban planning tools and workflows, ensuring seamless data exchange and compatibility.

title: Conduct Testing and Validation
description: Perform comprehensive testing and validation of the AI system, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Ensure System Security
description: Implement security measures to protect the AI system and its data, including access controls, encryption, and vulnerability testing.

title: Deploy and Maintain the System
description: Deploy the AI system to production environments, set up monitoring and logging, and establish processes for system maintenance and updates.

title: Create Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for urban planners and stakeholders to effectively use and understand the AI system.
